summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the cooperative agreement authorized by Ordinance 103620 between the City and Burlington Northern, Inc., for correction of earth-slide problems at Golden Gardens Park, and amending Section 1 of said ordinance to require as a provision of said agreement only that said corporation be responsible for one-half (1/2) the costs of such corrective action or Twenty-Seven Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($27,500), whichever is less.
